method.name: ResetPassword
method.comment: Sets the given password as the device password. Requires the reset-password tag in the policies file.

method.name: Enable
method.comment: Enables the admin policy. The user will be shown a dialog with the requested features. This method can only be called from an Activity context. Explanation - A message shown at the top of the dialog.

method.name: RequestNewPassword
method.comment: Shows the new password activity. Note that the user might cancel the change.

method.name: SetPasswordQuality
method.comment: Sets the minimum allowed length and quality for device passwords. These settings will affect new passwords. Requires the limit-password tag in the policies file. QualityFlag - One of the password quality flags. MinimumLength - Password minimum length. Example: manager.SetPasswordQuality(manager.PASSWORD_QUALITY_ALPHANUMERIC, 4)

method.name: LockScreen
method.comment: Immediately locks the screen. Requires the force-lock tag in the policies file.

property.name: Enabled
property.comment: Returns true if the admin policy is active.

property.name: PasswordSufficient
property.comment: Tests whether the current password meets the requirements. Requires the limit-password tag in the policies file.

property.name: MaximumTimeToLock
property.comment: Sets the maximum time (measured in milliseconds) before the device locks. This limits the length that the user can set in the settings screen. Requires the force-lock tag in the policies file.
